name: Winter Shooter
description:
A Christmas-Themed SHMUP for the Sega Master System; made for the "Jame Gam Christmas Edition".

This is distributed as a Sega Master System ROM; you will need an emulator to run it. It should probably be able to run on real hardware, but hasn't been tested.

Github repo: https://github.com/haroldo-ok/winter-shooter
